data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Thoma, Brent P., Heard, Richard W. (2009): A new species of the genus Gammarus (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Gammaridae) from the low salinity habitats in the northern Gulf of Mexico. Zootaxa 2015: 42-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185928
